scripts.vue-personal-page: cd apps/vue-personal-page && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../..
scripts.webjack: cd apps/webjack && rm -rf public && rm -rf webjack-ui && git clone https://github.com/L3bowski/webjack-ui && cd webjack-ui && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mv webjack-ui/dist public && rm -rf webjack-ui && cd ../..
scripts.build-apps: npm run vue-personal-page && npm run webjack
scripts.docker-prepare: npm run prepare-env && npm run build-apps
scripts.docker-start: docker run -d --name personal-server -p 80:80 -e DEFAULT_APP=vue-personal-page -e SESSION_SECRET=ssshhhhh -e ENABLE_CONSOLE_LOGS=true -e LOG_FILENAME=development.log -e TRACER_LEVEL=log l3bowski/personal-server:develop
scripts.docker-stop: docker stop personal-server && docker rm personal-server
scripts.docker-build-latest: npm run docker-prepare && docker build -t l3bowski/personal-server:latest .
